title: Mikhail Gorbachev Dies at 91 | Daily Best of August 31 | Rick & Bubba
description:
Former Soviet Union President Mikhail Gorbachev passes away at the age of 91. We look back the port-wine-stained leader's legacy weighed against the current Russian conflict. While speaking in Pennsylvania, Joe Biden struggles to endorse the correct candidate for the correct position, then follows up with inaccuracies about guns and basketball. Two men are rescued clinging to a floating cooler in Boston Harbor. And lastly, we think someone is sabotaging our bathroom.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
